name: Troll, Tumor
description: The Tumor Troll is characterized by its horrifying regenerative abilities and unique teratomas that can alter its capabilities. It has an intimidating presence due to its size and strength, with a grotesque form hinting at its chaotic nature.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate and gain random teratomas enhances its unpredictability, making it a formidable opponent that can change the dynamics of battle.
goals: To thrive in chaos and engage in brutal combat, using its regenerative abilities to outlast opponents.
relations: Trolls and other chaotic creatures may accompany or serve it, often creating an unpredictable and dangerous environment.
environment: Typically found in chaotic or wild areas where it can thrive and regenerate in battle.
strengths: Exceptional regenerative capabilities, high hit points, and the ability to adapt through teratomas.
weaknesses: Weak dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks and dexterity-based saving throws; susceptible to fire and acid damage that negate its regeneration.
attacks: Multiattack with two Bite attacks dealing piercing and poison damage, along with Claw attacks; can also fling limbs as a ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to regain 10 hit points each turn, except when taking acid or fire damage.
skills: Low passive perception with a -2 modifier, indicating its inability to notice details effectively.
additional_information: Gains teratomas that provide various combat enhancements or effects.
Can die only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and cannot regenerate.
Uncontrolled Growth ability allows adaptation in combat.
Immunity to poison damage enhances its durability in encounters.
Slow intelligence and wisdom indicate limited strategic capacity.
